alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Franklin; Logan; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, WEST CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN AND NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHERN MADISON AND UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near North Lewisburg to near London, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Hilliard, Marysville, London, Jefferson, Plain City, West Jefferson, Mechanicsburg, North Lewisburg, Choctaw Lake, New California, Lake Darby, Brighton, Milford Center, Lafayette, Woodstock, Unionville Center, Cable and Raymond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Franklin; Logan; Madison; Union
